title: You do not like them. So you say. Try them! Try them! And you may
post: If you ever get a chance to listen to Dr. Soons’ presentation, you should take the opportunity.  It is most certainly worth it as it is very interesting, if one agrees or disagrees with his research and findings.  He is a very intelligent man and can answer questions in his area of research and expertise.  He does honest work.
author: Andy Weiss

Diane has corrected the website. She wrote to me and I wrote back to her. I told her she was always welcome on the blog and could ask questions of us. 
Andy, I have followed the work of Dr. Soons. I don’t doubt his honesty. But I’m most cautious about the conclusions he arrives at. Type in “Soons” in the blog search field to see prior discussions.  Dan
